name: Blockman Jumper: Hidden Treasure Fever
description:
jump around and collect treasure. beware dangers like lava pits, tanks of acid, and mindless zombie blocks. plus you can swim, double jump, and discover useful switches. but can you find and collect all the hidden treasure?

WHAT IS THIS?

these two tech demos were made back in 2014 after the official launch of my game studio. i spent one month building this first Unity game project as a study of how to create a basic 2D platformer. the first mode has you freely explore a large cavern full of things to do. the second mode chains together multiple sidescrolling areas.

4TH ANNIVERSARY EDITION

for the fourth anniversary of the studio, i have put these two demos together into one playable multi-game. it is presented largely as it was and so it is left flawed and incomplete by design. enjoy this little piece of Cosmic Misfit Studio history.
